message: Hi Bob, I have a fantastic product I think you'd love! I'm offering it to you for $135.  What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Can you meet me in the middle?
Bob, I appreciate your interest, but $110 is a little too low for me.  I'm willing to come down a bit to $125.  Let's make a deal!
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $125 is still a bit too high for me. Can you try to meet me at $115?
Bob, I understand your position. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $120. This is the best I can do.
